title: Digital Forensic Investigation
description:
As processes and transactions become increasingly more streamlined using technology, digital forensics rises to be of paramount significance in the context of digital incident investigation. It is an essential methodology and skillset for an
effective and efficient analysis of voluminous varieties of digital sources to identify key evidence for investigation and court cases. This module examines the role of digital evidence in the forensic process and demonstrates the skillsets applied to
conduct digital forensic investigations.
